column2: Alpha, this is Papa Bear. The enemy will be arriving any minute. Get your men ready.
You need to break the back of the enemy by causing maximum casualties, or hold until friendly reinforcements arrive at about 1530. HQ out.
Alpha Black to Papa Bear. We have repelled the attack. Over.

Reinforcements are arriving Tubbergen. You've done your job. Mission successful. HQ out.
STRM_Rhqreply1,Papa Bear to Alpha Black. Looks like you've broken the back of the attack. Mission accomplished. HQ out."
